name: Brain Breaker
description:
Brain Breaker is a one touch jumping arcade game where your character bounces on the wall to change direction. Tap the screen to jump and break the gates that match the color with the background. If you get confuse and go for the wrong color you are dead.

Brain Breaker is a challenging game with insanely hard obstacles. Collect coins to unlock more than 30 different characters and new levels.

Use the power-ups to help to go further.

Avoid all obstacles and go through an unpredictable and colorful journey.

Features:

- 4 different modes
- Endless arcade action with a random map
- 60 levels to unlock
- 30 Unlockable Characters
- Amazing power-ups
